snippet: Lance Cpl. Joseph Pemberton had been charged with murder, but the court convicted him of the lesser offense of homicide in the death of Jennifer Laude.
abstract: United States Marine Lance Cpl Joseph Scott Pemberton is convicted of homicide in killing of Filipino transgender woman Jennifer Laude in 2014; is sentenced to 6 to 12 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Lance Cpl. Joseph Pemberton had been charged with murder, but the court convicted him of the lesser offense of homicide in the death of Jennifer Laude.

headline.main: U.S. Marine Guilty in Killing of Transgender Woman in Philippines
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; The Philippines: U.S. Marine Is Convicted of Homicide

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
